   <meta content="CCP Inc. - Dominica registered agent provide confidential offshore financial and company formation services. Low-cost off-shore Corporation can be set up online, we also offer ready made off shore corporations and vintage shelf off shore companies. Second passports (second citizenships) in Dominica and Grenada as well as offshore banking with off-shore Corporation are your way to anonymity, tax and personal freedom. Inexpensive Off-shore services such as: off-shore banking (incl. off-shore bank accounts in the Caribbean, anonymous offshore banking in Latvia, online anonymous banking in Lithuania), cheap off shore company formation and Dominica Economic Citizenship Program are our specialty. We can be your low cost representatives for second passport and second citizenship program, as an official government agent." name="description"/>

      <h1>
       Offshore Services
      </h1>
      <div class="col-2 t-block">
       <h2>
        Offshore Company Formation
       </h2>
       <ul>
        <li>
         <a href="/ENG/offshore-companies/">
          Offshore Companies
         </a>
         Formation in
         <a href="/ENG/best-tax-havens/">
          Best Tax Havens
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/ENG/offshore-foundations/">
          Offshore Foundations
         </a>
         Formation
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/ENG/offshore-trusts/">
          Offshore Trusts
         </a>
         Formation
        </li>
       </ul>
       <p>
        Please check our low-cost
        <a href="/ENG/offbusiness.HTM">
         Offshore Incorporation
        </a>
        Prices for:
       </p>
       <ul>
        <li>
         <a href="/ENG/prices-packages/llc_and_ibc_pricing.html">
          Offshore Company Formation
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/ENG/prices-packages/offshore_foundation_pricing.html">
          Offshore Foundation Formation
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/ENG/prices-packages/offshore_trust_pricing.html">
          Offshore Trust Formation
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         And specially designed bulletproof
         <a href="/ENG/prices-packages/asset_protection_pricing.html">
          Offshore Asset Protection
         </a>
         Packages
        </li>
       </ul>
       <p>
        Peace of mind and security can be yours.  Maximize profits with tax-sheltered trade and investment offshore corporations, while planning inheritance, succession and taxes with foundations and trusts.  Unbeatable Prices and Experienced Service Guaranteed!
       </p>
       <h2>
        Offshore Banking
       </h2>
       <p>
        We have carefully chosen and established long-standing relations with banks in the Caribbean, Europe and USA and as a result you can have the best
        <a href="/ENG/offshore-accounts/Offshore_Account.htm">
         Offshore Bank Account
        </a>
        options.
       </p>
       <p>
        We also offer
        <a href="/ENG/offshore-banks/forming_offshore_bank/form_offshore_bank/offshore_bank_formation.htm">
         Offshore Bank Licensing
        </a>
        services in Dominica.
       </p>
      </div>
      <div class="col-2 t-block">
       <h2>
        Second Passport and Citizenship
       </h2>
       <p>
        CCP Inc. has more than 15 years of exceptionally successful experience working with
        <a href="/ENG/secondcitizen.HTM">
         Second Citizenship
        </a>
        Programs.
       </p>
       <p>
        We process applications for second citizenships by way of real estate and economic investments under robustly regulated programs.  Each country offers two routes:
       </p>
       <ul>
        <li>
         <a href="/ENG/second-passport/2nd_passport/Second_Passport/Dominica_Citizenship_and_Second_Passport.htm">
          Dominica Citizenship
         </a>
         through Dominica Economic Citizenship Program
        </li>
        <li>
         <a href="/ENG/second-passport/2nd_passport/Second_Passport/St_Kitts_and_Nevis_Citizenship_by_Investment.html">
          St. Kitts Citizenship
         </a>
         through St. Kitts and Nevis Citizenship-by-Investment Program
        </li>
       </ul>
       <p class="safe-door">
        <em>
         CCP Inc. is your Reliable Gateway to Second Citizenship, Offshore Banking Professional Offshore Foundation, Offshore Trust and Offshore Company Formation Services!
        </em>
        <br/>
        <br/>
        <em>
         "All human beings have three lives: public, private and secret."
        </em>
       </p>
